titleStmt.title: The father of the faithfull tempted as was more concisely shewed August 31, 1674, at a solemne funeral in the church at Wotton under Edge in the countie of Gloucester / by Giles Oldisworth ...
titleStmt.author: Oldisworth, Giles, 1619-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: filmed copy dark and difficult to read.
